image.title: Redmi K80 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.101.0.VOKCNXM Recovery update for Redmi K80 China
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi K80 China

Codename: zorn

Version: OS2.0.101.0.VOKCNXM | 15.0

Size: 7.1 GB

MD5: 56d3888e3093f49463c375a465f156eb

Changelog:
[System animations]
New: During the process of opening or closing apps, the full screen indicator follows the window's movement
New: When quickly opening and closing apps, multiple app animations are displayed simultaneously
[System]
New: Support for one-tap clipboard clearing
Optimization: Bluetooth status bar icon
[Home screen]
New: After turning off the Home screen search bar, a 4×6 layout option becomes available
[Xiaomi HyperConnect]
New: Support for file transfers between different devices using different Xiaomi Accounts
Optimization: Device connection pop-ups
[Lock screen]
New: Scenery templates
[Gallery]
Optimization: "On this day" feature now supports hiding content
Optimization: Day and month views are available for the start page
Optimization: Search results page can now show the progress of Gallery analysis by AI
Optimization: Search results for identification documents
Optimization: Display layouts for Gallery items
Optimization: Gallery now supports deleting and hiding items via long pressing
Optimization: Search results for time and location keywords
Fix: CAD images were mistakenly placed in Gallery

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.12.0.VOKCNXM Recovery update for Redmi K80 China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi K80 China

Codename: zorn

Version: OS2.0.12.0.VOKCNXM | 15.0

Size: 7.1 GB

MD5: 44c050c43ea6253b3e26c879894a6ee6

Changelog:
[Highlights]
Optimization: Frame drops and stuttering issues in Honor of Kings
Optimization: Improved smoothness and reduced lag in Game for Peace
[Basic improvements]
Optimization: Optimized the hot zone for full screen gestures for instant response
Optimization: Stability issues such as Douyin crashes and short video playback errors
Fix: Home screen or Lock screen turned black when the wallpaper process was terminated
Fix: Screen flickered when re-entering certain games from Recents
[System]
Optimization: Touchscreen experience
[Control center]
Fix: Occasional overlapping of Notification shade and the Control center
[Settings]
Optimization: Battery health display

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
